string.text: The character does not have enough money
The trader isn’t interested in items like this.
The item is too damaged to be traded.

Radioactive poisoning
 
%c[0,170,170,170]Exposure to ionizing radiation poses an extremely high risk to USS operator and thus radiation levels managing becomes a key element for his operational effectivness within Chernobyl Exclusion Zone.
 
%c[0,170,170,170]For the purpose of such operations ionizing radiation scale is measured in milisiverts (%c[0,210,210,210]mSv%c[0,170,170,170]). Attaining radiation level of approximately %c[0,210,210,210]8000 mSv %c[0,170,170,170]is usually lethal without chance for recovery. Radiation levels up to above threshold gradually reduce USS operative's performance capabilities. For this reason, in case of exposure it is strongly advised to administer radiation cleansing agent of appropriate potency as soon as possible. Table 3.2 presents radiation ammounts chart with typical symptoms:
 
%c[0,210,210,210]250 – 1000 mSv: %c[0,170,170,170]Symptoms are unnoticable. Long term consequences are neglectable.
 
%c[0,210,210,210]1000 – 3000 mSv: %c[0,170,170,170]Noticable moderate to strong sickness, lightheadedness, skin taints. Long-term symptoms are mild. Full recovery is feasible.
 
%c[0,210,210,210]3000 – 6000 mSv: %c[0,170,170,170]Very strong sickness, confusion and dizziness. Complete cease of nutrition craving, bleeding (including internal), taint, diarrhea, slough skin. Permanent loss of reproductin ability. Short-term operational capableness can be restored but full recovery will not be possible.
 
%c[0,210,210,210]6000 – 10000 mSv: %c[0,170,170,170]Increase in all above symptoms potency. Additionally permanent damage to central nervous system. Almost full certainty of premature death.
 
%c[0,210,210,210]10000 mSv and above: %c[0,170,170,170]Imminent death. Often after rapid loss of consciousness.
 
%c[0,210,210,210]FACTS:
 
%c[0,153,255,255] • %c[0,140,140,140] unit: %c[0,210,210,210]mSv (milisivert)
%c[0,153,255,255] • %c[0,140,140,140] imminent mortal radiation: %c[0,210,210,210]~8000 mSv
%c[0,153,255,255] • %c[0,140,140,140] av. outside rad. hot-spots potency: %c[0,210,210,210]~250 mSv / sec
Buy underbarrel grenade launcher for rifle (D)

Flame / acid
 
%c[0,210,210,210]1. FIRE:
 
%c[0,170,170,170]Typical flame anomaly in Chernobyl Exclusion Zone is consisted of two distinct elements: %c[0,210,210,210]a hemisphere-shaped thermal radiation field -%c[0,170,170,170] producing constant temperatures of up to %c[0,210,210,210]430 °C%c[0,170,170,170] (degrees Celsius) and %c[0,210,210,210]fire outburst spots -%c[0,170,170,170] air-immolating emmisions of flames with up to %c[0,210,210,210]1000 °C%c[0,170,170,170] temperature. Emmisions of this type are triggered by any solid objects appearance in their gravitational activation field.
 
%c[0,170,170,170]For assesment of potency of Exlusion Zone's flame anomalies and available counter-measures a %c[0,210,210,210]kW/m2 eq.%c[0,170,170,170] (for kilowatts per square meter equivalents) scale is being used. This unit indicates a density of heat flux generated by an anomaly and thus the power which affects objects placed in it
 
%c[0,210,210,210]FACTS:
 
%c[0,153,255,255] • %c[0,140,140,140] radiation req. to immolate wood: %c[0,210,210,210]540 °C or 35 kW/m2
%c[0,153,255,255] • %c[0,140,140,140] medium-sized campfire: %c[0,210,210,210]500 °C or 29 kW/m2
 
%c[0,153,255,255] • %c[0,140,140,140] average thermal rad. field: %c[0,210,210,210]430 °C or 19,8 kW/m2
%c[0,153,255,255] • %c[0,140,140,140] average fire outburst: %c[0,210,210,210]1000 °C or 212 kW/m2
%c[0,153,255,255] • %c[0,140,140,140] SSP suit heat resistance: %c[0,210,210,210]1194 °C or 376 kW/m2
 
%c[0,153,255,255] • %c[0,140,140,140] approx. unprotected surival time: %c[0,210,210,210]RF: 6 sec / FO: 0,5 sec
%c[0,153,255,255] • %c[0,140,140,140] approx. complete armor degr. time: %c[0,210,210,210]RF: 35 sec / FO: 6 sec
 
%c[0,140,140,140]RF = radiation field
%c[0,140,140,140]FO = fire outburst
 
%c[0,210,210,210]2. ACID:
 
%c[0,170,170,170]Acidic outburst can materialize withing Exlusion Zone's intense toxicity areas (toxic anomalies). Outbursts are capable of producing up to %c[0,210,210,210]0,5 liters%c[0,170,170,170] of acidic agents equivalent to %c[0,210,210,210]50%%c[0,170,170,170] concentrate of sulfur acid.
 
%c[0,170,170,170]As acid affects the human body and equipment in similar way to thermal radiation (and protective means are mostly the same), potency of acidic hazards is also usually given in %c[0,210,210,210]kW/m2 eq.%c[0,170,170,170] scale.
 
%c[0,210,210,210]FACTS:
 
%c[0,153,255,255] • %c[0,140,140,140] Average 'Fruit punch' anomaly potency: %c[0,210,210,210]120 °C or 1,9 kW/m2 eq.

Toxicity
 
%c[0,170,170,170]Due to yet not fully understood nature of substances concentrated inside '%c[0,210,210,210]anomalies type T'%c[0,170,170,170], danger assesment of these areas needs to be performed accordingly to universal %c[0,210,210,210]LC50 (human)%c[0,170,170,170] standard.
 
%c[0,170,170,170]This standard measures overall toxicity of gasous envirnoment accordingly to level of concentration it takes to kill %c[0,210,210,210]50%%c[0,170,170,170] of any random human group during exposure lasting %c[0,210,210,210]1 hour%c[0,170,170,170].
 
%c[0,170,170,170]As in most cases it only takes 10 parts per milion (%c[0,210,210,210]ppm%c[0,170,170,170]) concentration of Exlusion Zone's anomalous, bio-chemical agents to exceed %c[0,210,210,210]50% / 1 h%c[0,170,170,170] mortality rate, they rightfully belong to the most potent, %c[0,210,210,210]Class I%c[0,170,170,170] cathegory of known toxic substances (Exlusion Zones anomalous have been proven to be able to have 200 ppm concentration of such substances making them one of the most hostile envirnoments on the planet).
 
%c[0,170,170,170]For this reason and for asset assesment convenience both: anomalous areas potency and protective gear effectivity is graded by ammount of equivalent of parts per milion (%c[0,210,210,210]ppm eq.%c[0,170,170,170]) concentration of %c[0,210,210,210]Class I%c[0,170,170,170] toxic substance.
 
%c[0,170,170,170]Reconnaissance data attained so far indicates that in case of mission requiring venture into one of the Exclusion Zone's toxic anomalous areas, it is adivsed to use locally aquired equipment desinged specifically for Exclusion Zone's 'artifact' extorsions. However, even when appropriate protection to USS operative's health is assured, it is still strongly advised to avoid prolonged exposure to such envirnoments due to their proven equipment damaging, corrosive properties.
 
%c[0,204,0,51]IMPORTANT:
 
%c[0,170,170,170]Exlusion Zone's toxic fields are very often accompanied with concentrated acid sources which are capable of producing outbursts of highly potent acidic agents. Refer to 'Chapter 5: Flame / acid' of USS Field Manual for futher details.
 
%c[0,210,210,210]FACTS:
 
%c[0,153,255,255] • %c[0,140,140,140] av. toxic anomaly potency: %c[0,210,210,210]~120 ppm eq.
%c[0,153,255,255] • %c[0,140,140,140] av. unprot. survival time: %c[0,210,210,210]~3 min 
%c[0,153,255,255] • %c[0,140,140,140] av. time for compl. suit degr.: %c[0,210,210,210]~25 min

Outside radiation
 
%c[0,170,170,170]Current readings indicate the radiation which can be encountered in the Exclusion Zone is mostly carried by solid %c[0,210,210,210]alpha %c[0,170,170,170]particles which are present in dirt, sand, water and thus in all living beings present in the area for prolonged period of time. Such radiation cannot penetrate skin and only becomes effective when particles carrying it are injected into the body itself - for example thru inhaling dust or eating contaminated food. For this reason it is strongly advised to operate around the Exlusion Area wearing filtered breathing apparatus of even the most simple desing and avoid reliance on local nutrition sources.
 
As to penetrating %c[0,210,210,210]beta %c[0,170,170,170]radiation - it can only been detected in vinicity of the Sarcophagus and still hot remnants of melted fuel in it. Relatively low power %c[0,210,210,210]gamma %c[0,170,170,170]blasts have also been detected accompanying surges.
 
%c[0,210,210,210]FACTS:
 
%c[0,153,255,255] • %c[0,140,140,140]cloth mask protection rate: %c[0,210,210,210]45%
%c[0,153,255,255] • %c[0,140,140,140]breathing filters protection rate: %c[0,210,210,210]90%
%c[0,153,255,255] • %c[0,140,140,140]envirnomental suit protection rate.: %c[0,210,210,210]100%

Electricity
 
%c[0,170,170,170]Exlusion Zone's electrical anomalies are certainly one of its potentialy most benefitial creations. Powerfull and constant electric arcs which are stretched seemingly in thin air, when harnessed could provide enormous ammounts of clean energy. Unfortunately all attempts to drain electricity from these sources have failed as whatever reality warp have caused their appearance, it is extremely sensitive to contact with any solid matter resulting in massive outbursts of energy. During these both voltage and current rise so enormously and rapidly to completely destroy any capaciting circuit known to modern science.
 
%c[0,170,170,170]Voltages produced during anomaly outbursts often reach no less then 3,5 megavolts (%c[0,210,210,210]MV%c[0,170,170,170]) which allows the current to jump up to %c[0,210,210,210]3 meters%c[0,170,170,170] in thin air. However since the outbursts times are roughly around %c[0,210,210,210]50 miliseconds%c[0,170,170,170], energy produced inside the body remains in often survivable scale. Still, extensive health damage and severe trauma should be expected and the second outburst (which is very likely to happen if field is not exited promptly) is in most cases lethal.
 
%c[0,170,170,170]As with all static electrical discharges the main mean of protection is increasing of electrical resistance of the body. This can be achieved in many ways, primarly by wearing protective, non-conductive clothing. There are also military and civilian grade surge supressors available on the market. It is also known that certain 'artifacts' found in Exlusion Zone are very potent electrical resistors.
 
%c[0,170,170,170]For the purpose of USS operations in Exlusion Zone effectivity of all electricy-protecting means and combat armors is counted in kilovolts (%c[0,210,210,210]kV%c[0,170,170,170]), which certain piece of equipment is able to supress during a single %c[0,210,210,210]3000 kV%c[0,170,170,170] / %c[0,210,210,210]50 ms%c[0,170,170,170] outburst of electrical anomaly.
 
%c[0,210,210,210]FACTS:
 
%c[0,153,255,255] • %c[0,140,140,140] av. electrical anomaly power: %c[0,210,210,210]~3 MV
%c[0,153,255,255] • %c[0,140,140,140]single outburst dam. rate to unprot. body: %c[0,210,210,210] 95%

Psy influence
 
%c[0,170,170,170]Scientific data regarding origin and nature of so called 'psy fields' found inside Chernobyl Exlusion Zone is %c[0,204,0,51]classified%c[0,170,170,170] and not relevant to this mission.
 
%c[0,170,170,170]What is essential for any USS operative is that these influences pose an extreme danger to any human being getting in range of various emission sources. Such fields, which often have a shape of hemi-sphere surrounding the source, are able to either immediately kill or induce an unrecoverable coma within seconds of exposure. While this is usually not the case when being at the edge of the field, potency when getting closer to the source increases at geometric rate.
 
%c[0,170,170,170]It has been detected that beside the main psy influence, each field also produces a faint, low frequency (%c[0,210,210,210]50-60 Hz%c[0,170,170,170]) magnetic field which althou harmless, can be easly detected and measured allowing for assesment of main psy field's strenght. For this reason potency of psy fields (and effectivity of counter-measures) is given in militeslas (%c[0,210,210,210]mT%c[0,170,170,170]) which indicate intensity of accompanying magnetic field.
 
%c[0,210,210,210]KNOWN SOURCES:
 
%c[0,153,255,255] • %c[0,140,140,140] surge emssion: %c[0,210,210,210]35 mT (constant flux)
%c[0,153,255,255] • %c[0,140,140,140] average psy anomaly: %c[0,210,210,210]E 3mT ; C 45 mT
%c[0,153,255,255] • %c[0,140,140,140] controller mutant: %c[0,210,210,210]E 5 mT ; C 75 mT
%c[0,153,255,255] • %c[0,140,140,140] poltergeist mutant: %c[0,210,210,210]E 8 mT ; C 90 mT
%c[0,153,255,255] • %c[0,140,140,140] burer mutant: %c[0,210,210,210]E 2 mT ; C 50 mT
%c[0,153,255,255] • %c[0,140,140,140] psy-dog mutant: %c[0,210,210,210]E 0.1 mT ; C 15 mT
%c[0,153,255,255] • %c[0,140,140,140] Yantar complex (inactive): %c[0,210,210,210]E 25 mT ; C 360 mT (est.)
%c[0,153,255,255] • %c[0,140,140,140] 'Brain scorcher' (inactive): %c[0,210,210,210]E 45 mT ; C 540 mT (est.)
 
%c[0,140,140,140]E = edge of the field
%c[0,140,140,140]C = epicenter of the field
Online S.T.A.L.K.E.R. services are not accessible.

Bleeding
 
%c[0,170,170,170]Bleeding can drain vital power from organism at very fast rate if not treated promtly. Bleeding wounds can appear whenever external, physical force of any type penetrates thru body armor and raptures skin possibly reaching internal organs. It can also be a result of open bone fractures caused by blunt trauma.
 
%c[0,170,170,170]Averege USS operator can survive up to approximately %c[0,210,210,210]2,7 liter %c[0,170,170,170]blood volume loss to remain self-sustaining. Extremely serious (or a large number of smaller) wounds can make body loose this ammount in %c[0,210,210,210]10 to 5 minutes%c[0,170,170,170]. Bandages or field wound sewing kits are effective at treating bleeding wounds instanously, while blood density or coagulation speed increasing agents can be used to reduce its overall rate.
 
%c[0,210,210,210]FACTS:
 
%c[0,153,255,255] • %c[0,140,140,140] body blood volume: %c[0,210,210,210]~7 liters
%c[0,153,255,255] • %c[0,140,140,140] mortal blood loss: %c[0,210,210,210]~2,7 liters
%c[0,153,255,255] • %c[0,140,140,140] very severe bleeding rate: %c[0,210,210,210]~250 ml / min
%c[0,153,255,255] • %c[0,140,140,140] 5.45 mun. shoot to unprot. torso: %c[0,210,210,210]~320 ml / min
Allows you to survive an emission
